Attributes.description: Combining basic physical principles with their mathematical description and generating computational models that describe them. Introduction to basic building blocks in modelling, simulation and parameter estimation.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of MATH 200, MATH 253 and one of MATH 152, MATH 221, MATH 223 and one of APSC 160, CPSC 103, CPSC 110, EOSC 211.
